H0.text: Simon Legree is the villain in which famous novel. Bill Sikes

H1.text: Simon Legree is the villain in which famous novel. Professor Moriarty

H2.text: Simon Legree is the villain in which famous novel. Uriah Heep

H3.text: Simon Legree is the villain in which famous novel. Legree

A4.text: Simon Legree is a cruel slave owner—a Northerner by birth—whose name has become synonymous with greed and cruelty.

A5.text: He eventually orders Tom whipped to death out of frustration for his slave's unbreakable belief in God.

A6.text: He sexually exploits Cassy, who despises him, and later sets his designs on Emmeline.

A7.text: He abandoned his sickly mother for a life at sea and ignored her letter to see her one last time at her deathbed.
